name: Stacksync
headline: Real-time and two-way sync between CRMs and Databases
description:
Stacksync powers real-time and bidirectional data synchronization between CRMs (e.g. Salesforce, Hubspot or SAP) and databases (e.g. Postgres, Google BigQuery,...). Edits made in your CRM will instantly update in your Database, and vice-versa. To set up a sync, users simply have to connect the two chosen apps in one click and select the tables they want to sync, no-code!
Stacksync reduces implementation delays from months to minutes for CRM integration projects and removes all the complexity behind CRM new feature development. We show a 90% improvement on delivery time and budget.

founders.name: Ruben Burdin, Founder
founders.description: Data movement, CRM and ERP. Currently redefining Enterprise systems integration.

founders.name: Alexis Favre, Founder
founders.description: Building the future of Data Movement! (and baking delicious french bakeries ;)

# Two-way sync 
# at scale 
# in real time.
Stacksync helps your teams access and manipulate CRM and ERP data through your existing databases. We remove the infrastructure and API works from your team so you focus on building your business’ competitive advantage.
[Sign up for trial](https://www.stacksync.cloud/<https:/app.stacksync.com/>)

→ How it works
##  Setup in minutes without APIs
Configure and sync data within minutes without code. Whether you sync 50k or 100M+ records, Stacksync handles all the dirty plumbing of infrastructure, queues and code so you don’t have to. Integrations are non-invasive and do not require any setup on your systems.
[Learn more about two-way syncing![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67942fb99dae8423ad049de6_Icon%20arrow.svg)](https://www.stacksync.cloud/</connectors>)
### [Connect your appsConnect in one click your apps with OAuth or any secure connection option such as SSH tunelling, SSL Certificates and more.](https://www.stacksync.cloud/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)### [Choose tablesStacksync supports all standard and custom objects in your systems. Sync your business system objects to existing tables in your database or let Stacksync create new tables perfect datatypes to get started in seconds.](https://www.stacksync.cloud/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)### [Map fieldsAutomatically map fields between your systems even when they have different names and datatypes. Stacksync handles data transformation and type casting for you.If you don't have existing tables to sync with in your database, Stacksync will create a new table for you with the perfect schema and ideal datatypes. Zero configuration required from you side.](https://www.stacksync.cloud/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)

##### → Workflow Automation
## Take action across all your tools with Workflow Automation.
[Explore workflow automation ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/679cc730c779fb35f690bcc5_Icon.svg)](https://www.stacksync.cloud/</connectors>)
### Rapid prototyping, one-click production deployment
Connect all your systems saving 90% engineering time, no maintenance required.Use 700+ pre-built connectors or connect to any other system via API. Workflows support SaaS tools, Database transformation automation, IoT, Sensors and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a424709f2648b2af804bea_Connect--applications.svg)
#### No-code, no maintenance
Regulate data with role-based access controls. Manage your API endpoints with advanced endpoint security.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a42c69b105c2813bd9d50e_Transform--02.svg)
#### Transformations
Seamlessly manipulate data to match the different data models across your systems.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a42c9906269155b64ab053_Infrastructure-security.svg)
#### Managed infra for scale
Remove the infrastructure and security overhead from you teams. Scale instantly to million of executions per minute.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a42c8aeb4c1064f3c83e9a_Enterprise.svg)
#### Enterprise extensibility
Managed Kafka queues, replay failed workflows anytime like time travel, execute code files within workflows modules.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a42c7f3c562061c4e4f20e_Access-management.svg)
#### Governance
Regulate data with role-based access controls. Manage your API endpoints with advanced endpoint security.

→ How it works
##  Setup in minutes without APIs
Configure and sync data within minutes without code. Whether you sync 50k or 100M+ records, Stacksync handles all the dirty plumbing of infrastructure, queues and code so you don’t have to. Integrations are non-invasive and do not require any setup on your systems.
Learn more about two-way syncing![⟨34⟩](https://www.stacksync.cloud/</connectors>)
### Connect your appsConnect in one click your apps with OAuth or any secure connection option such as SSH tunelling, SSL Certificates and more.⟨58⟩### Choose tablesStacksync supports all standard and custom objects in your systems. Sync your business system objects to existing tables in your database or let Stacksync create new tables perfect datatypes to get started in seconds.⟨59⟩### Map fieldsAutomatically map fields between your systems even when they have different names and datatypes. Stacksync handles data transformation and type casting for you.If you don't have existing tables to sync with in your database, Stacksync will create a new table for you with the perfect schema and ideal datatypes. Zero configuration required from you side.⟨60⟩

## Take action across all your tools with Workflow Automation.
Explore workflow automation ![⟨7⟩](https://www.stacksync.cloud/</connectors>)
### Rapid prototyping, one-click production deployment
Connect all your systems saving 90% engineering time, no maintenance required.Use 700+ pre-built connectors or connect to any other system via API. Workflows support SaaS tools, Database transformation automation, IoT, Sensors and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a424709f2648b2af804bea_Connect--applications.svg)
#### No-code, no maintenance
Regulate data with role-based access controls. Manage your API endpoints with advanced endpoint security.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a42c69b105c2813bd9d50e_Transform--02.svg)
#### Transformations
Seamlessly manipulate data to match the different data models across your systems.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a42c9906269155b64ab053_Infrastructure-security.svg)
#### Managed infra for scale
Remove the infrastructure and security overhead from you teams. Scale instantly to million of executions per minute.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a42c8aeb4c1064f3c83e9a_Enterprise.svg)
#### Enterprise extensibility
Managed Kafka queues, replay failed workflows anytime like time travel, execute code files within workflows modules.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6791a32efd1c9d1f3a5ec8ea/67a42c7f3c562061c4e4f20e_Access-management.svg)
#### Governance
Regulate data with role-based access controls. Manage your API endpoints with advanced endpoint security.

generated_description:
**Stacksync: Simplifying Data Synchronization**

Founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, Stacksync is revolutionizing the way businesses manage their data. As part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, the company is on a mission to provide real-time, bidirectional synchronization between customer relationship management (CRM) systems like Salesforce and HubSpot, and databases including Postgres and Google BigQuery. 

Imagine a world where updates made in your CRM are instantly reflected in your databases and vice-versa—no code, no hassle. That’s what Stacksync delivers. Their approach reduces CRM integration project timelines from months to mere minutes, showing a remarkable 90% improvement in delivery time and budget.
